name: Electrical Design Engineer (Инженер-проектировщик систем электроснабжения)
description:
Уважаемые кандидаты,

Пожалуйста, присылайте резюме на английском языке (владение английским является одним из обязательных требований).

Responsibilities:

  • Being in charge of producing documents and deliverables assigned to him/her by the Project Leader guaranteeing the quality, the assigned budget and time;

  • Being appointed to tasks with different technical complexity and requiring different levels of skill; coordination of other engineers and/or draftsmen can be implied

  • Guarantee the quality of the generated deliverables and their compliance with the contractual and company standards, procedures and work instructions;

  • Attend to technical training as per department needs and exchange experience with colleagues of the entire Company for new Design techniques;

  • To be aware of the technical specific improvement of the discipline;

  • Develop the specifications and data sheet of electrical switchgear, plant equipment and materials, including the technical characteristic of their subsystems and components and, according to his/her skills, to perform sizing and verification calculations;

  • Check and approve vendors' documents;

Requirements:

  • Bachelor/Masters degree in Engineering with minimum 7-year experience in Electrical engineering design for Oil & Gas / Petrochemical industry

  • Strong knowledge of industry codes and standards, with a deep focus on standard and laws applicable to Russian Federation

  • Fluent English and Russian

  • Good communication and problem-solving skills

  • Ability to cope with conflicting deadlines, frequent interruptions and multiple tasks

Additional information:
  • Competitive salary (subject to discussion with successful candidate)
  • Benefits package includes medical insurance and meal allowance
  • Fixed-term contract (as per Project requirements)
  • Work location: Moscow
